name: generate_sankey_chart
description: Generate a sankey chart to visualize the flow of data between different stages or categories, such as, the user journey from landing on a page to completing a purchase.

data.description: Date for sankey chart, such as, [{ source: 'Landing Page', target: 'Product Page', value: 50000 }, { source: 'Product Page', target: 'Add to Cart', value: 35000 }, { source: 'Add to Cart', target: 'Checkout', value: 25000 }, { source: 'Checkout', target: 'Payment', value: 15000 }, { source: 'Payment', target: 'Purchase Completed', value: 8000 }].

nodeAlign.description: Alignment of nodes in the sankey chart, such as, 'left', 'right', 'justify', or 'center'.

style.description: Custom style configuration for the chart.

backgroundColor.description: Background color of the chart, such as, '#fff'.

palette.description: Color palette for the chart, it is a collection of colors.

texture.description: Set the texture for the chart, optional, default is 'default'. 'rough' refers to hand-drawn style.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.
